name: The Curse of the Four Towers
name_original: The Curse of the Four Towers
description:
The towers are casting a curse that changes the world every ten seconds. It is your job to stop the curse and return the world to normalcy.

WASD/Arrow Keys to move, mouse to aim and shoot.

Thanks to Common for doing the modelling and Jonathan Vinesar for doing the audio!

Unfortunately, I could not get a Mac build to work, so Mac people will just have to play the WebGL version.
